metadata.title: CVE-2016-6810 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Apache ActiveMQ 5.x before 5.14.2, an instance of a cross-site scriptingvulnerability was identified to be present in the web based administrationconsole. The root cause of this issue is improper user data outputvalidation.

criterions.comment: activemq: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
